item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Thanks to everyone who made it out for the BBQ today, it was a fantastic event. Special thanks to all the volunteers who made it happen!

item.title: Mentioned by South Asian Link
item.description:
MP Sandhu To Host Town Hall Meeting On Pattullo Upgrades
Surrey-North MP Jasbir Sandhu wants to keep the dialog going, now focusing on the role the federal government can play in the review and renewal process. “When I attended the public consultations on the Pattullo Bridge, I noticed that so far there has been ...

item.title: Mentioned by Surrey Now
item.description:
Calendar's too short for all our special causes
So Surrey North MP Jasbir Sandhu is using his position in the House of Commons to push for the month of April to be declared as Punjabi Heritage Month. Really? That's the most important issue facing his constituents? Mr. Sandhu can't think of any other ...

item.title: Mentioned by The Province
item.description:
Let's be inclusive
Regarding Surrey North MP Jasbir Sandhu's proposal to designate April as Punjabi Heritage Month, let us all celebrate. There are some 180 ethnic groups that make up the residents of Canada, according to Wikipedia's comments on the 2010 Canadian ...

item.title: Mentioned by Surrey Now
item.description:
In which month do we celebrate Canadians?
Surrey North MP Jasbir Sandhu is pushing for Canada to proclaim April as Punjabi Heritage Month. If this is allowed, it will create a situation where any immigrant group can demand a month to honour their culture. How ridiculous would that be? We would be ...
